The new video is up! Here's a

. Just some details about upcoming episodes and the debut of the new intro. I hope you like it.

I'm all set up in my new location. I have a crappy chair and slightly slower internet (using wireless instead of Ethernet) but other than that nothing's really changed.

I'm all set up in my new location. I have a crappy chair and slightly slower internet (using wireless instead of Ethernet) but other than that nothing's really changed.

Hopefully this saturday we can do the stress test of everyone and get the first turn done.

Hey guys,

it is with a heavy heart and deep sorrow that i write this. Unfortunately my life has become increasingly more hectic over the past few weeks and will continue to do so for some time. Therefore i regret to inform you that it is no longer possible for me to partake in this series. I would suggest giving my place to tylore, but that decision is ultimately up to you. My decision i feel is made in the best interest of all parties. I with you all luck with this project in the future and bid you fair well at the same time.

yours,

xgu28

I am sorry to hear that.

However I understand that that can come up and wish you the best of luck. If your life ever calms down we will be here and welcome you back with open arms.

I wish you the best of luck!

While I hate to have to say this, we need another fighter. We have 2 opens, make a trader a fighter and have a trader role open or bring someone else in.

First tylore are you interested? Do you have recording software and a decent mic? Also what time zone are you in?
